name: Rocket Boost 3D
description:
ROCKET BOOST 3D

Can you land your rocket safely in the space?

Press "A" and "D" to rotate and "SPACE" to thrust your rocket. 
Land safely on the landing pad and proceed to the next level.
This version has 10 levels. Last levels contain a follow camera.
I have added a "cheat mode" where you press "C" and turn off the colliders and when you press "L" for next level, for debugging and testing. Then I've decided not to remove them.
I haven't added any menu yet, so you can use ALT + F4 to close the game.

I hope you enjoy!GitHub page for this game https://github.com/Scientist8/Rocket_Boost_3D.game
